name: Project Accuracy 🧱
description:
What is this ?

This is a very short demo to test out the core gameplay loop and get some feedbacks. All the art / audio are placeholders.

The idea was to create a small static level with most of the core mechanics and some level of polish and see if this might work as a base for a full game.

For questions, feedbacks, please leave a comment here or on our discord: https://bit.ly/colin-discord

How to play ?

Left click to shoot, right click (or shift) to teleport to your projectile. That's it.
In the demo, you can move around, break things, push enemies, etc...

FAQs
  • Who did the pixel art? I'm using a slightly modified version of 0x72's tileset: https://0x72.itch.io/
  • Can I stream this demo?
    Ofc course ! Feel free to ping me on twitter if you do it, i'd love to see this :3
